name: Vegetarian Pasta Primavera
short_description: A colorful and flavorful pasta dish with a variety of fresh vegetables.
long_description: Vegetarian Pasta Primavera is a delightful combination of pasta and vibrant vegetables sautéed to perfection. The dish is finished with a touch of Parmesan cheese and fresh basil, creating a satisfying and nutritious meal.
instructions: Cook pasta according to package instructions.
In a pan, sauté garlic in olive oil, add vegetables and cook until tender.
Toss with cooked pasta, Parmesan cheese, and fresh basil.
